scripts.deploy-gateway: gcloud functions deploy tefi-graphql --entry-point tefiGraphqlGateway --runtime nodejs14 --trigger-http --allow-unauthenticated
scripts.deploy-anc: gcloud functions deploy anchor-graphql --entry-point anchorHandler --runtime nodejs14 --trigger-http --allow-unauthenticated
scripts.deploy-core: gcloud functions deploy terraCore-graphql --entry-point terraCoreHandler --runtime nodejs14 --trigger-http --allow-unauthenticated
scripts.deploy-spectrum: gcloud functions deploy spectrum-graphql --entry-point spectrumHandler --runtime nodejs14 --trigger-http --allow-unauthenticated
scripts.deploy-apollo: gcloud functions deploy apollo-graphql --entry-point apolloHandler --runtime nodejs14 --trigger-http --allow-unauthenticated
scripts.deploy-pylon: gcloud functions deploy pylon-graphql --entry-point pylonHandler --runtime nodejs14 --trigger-http --allow-unauthenticated
scripts.deploy-terraworld: gcloud functions deploy terraworld-graphql --entry-point terraworldHandler --runtime nodejs14 --trigger-http --allow-unauthenticated
scripts.deploy-starterra: gcloud functions deploy starterra-graphql --entry-point starterraHandler  --runtime nodejs14 --trigger-http --allow-unauthenticated
scripts.deploy-loterra: gcloud functions deploy loterra-graphql --entry-point loterraHandler --runtime nodejs14 --trigger-http --allow-unauthenticated
scripts.deploy-mirror: gcloud functions deploy mirror-graphql --entry-point mirrorHandler --runtime nodejs14 --trigger-http --allow-unauthenticated
